text: Alla Tumanian (also Tumanyan; ; born March 17, 1950) is an Armenian-American theatre and film actress. == Biography == Tumanian was born in 1953 in Yerevan, Soviet Union. In 1971, she graduated from the Yerevan State Institute of Theater and Fine Arts, the Faculty of acting. 1971-1990 she worked at Sundukyan State Academic Theatre of Yerevan, 1990-1991 at "Metro" theatre.Alla Tumanyan's biography and film list on arm-cinema.amAlla Tumanyan == Selected filmography == {| class="wikitable" |- !
